Category.Name: Forms
Category.Description: Get the user’s details to authenticate, create a profile, and enter credit card information for online payment portal.

Page.Name: Simple Login Page
Page.Description: If you want a simple and clean authentication form, just add this page to your application. Email validation is done within this form.

Page.Name: Simple Sign Up Page
Page.Description: This is a supporting form for a simple login page that can be modified to match any of your login pages on the fly. Email validation is done in this form.

Page.Name: Simple Reset Password Page
Page.Description: This page is used for resetting a password with existing credentials or signing up if the user doesn’t have credentials yet.

Page.Name: Simple Forgot Password Page
Page.Description: This page follows a login page through a Forgot Password option. If a username does not exist, users can easily sign up from this page.

Page.Name: Login Page With Gradient
Page.Description: If you want a simple and clean authentication form, then just add this page to your application. Email validation is done within this form.

Page.Name: Sign Up Page With Gradient
Page.Description: This is a supporting form for a simple login page that you can modify to match any of your login pages on the fly. Email validation is done in this form.

Page.Name: Reset Password Page With Gradient
Page.Description: This page is used for resetting a password with existing credentials or signing up if the user doesn’t have credentials yet.

Page.Name: Forgot Password Page With Gradient
Page.Description: This page follows a login page through a Forgot Password option. If a username does not exist, users can easily sign up from this page.

Page.Name: Add Contact Page
Page.Description: This page allows users to add a new entry to their contacts by entering various information such as name, email address, and phone number.

Page.Name: Tabbed Login Page
Page.Description: This page is a multi-tabbed user interface where one tab provides a login page and another tab provides a sign-up form.

Page.Name: Add Card Page
Page.Description: This page allows users to enter credit card information for use in an online payment portal.

Category.Name: Catalog
Category.Description: Let the users select from the list of items that includes titles, brief descriptions, and photos.

Page.Name: Category Tile Page
Page.Description: Displaying an image with a title is a scenario in most applications, and this page categorizes product images and provides a title for the category.

Page.Name: Catalog Tile Page
Page.Description: In any e-commerce application, showcasing a product with a rating and other details is mandatory. This page showcases a set of products with a short description, price, and user rating.

Page.Name: Catalog List Page
Page.Description: Displaying an image with some information is a scenario in many applications, and this page showcases product images with their titles, prices, and discounted prices.

Page.Name: Article List Page
Page.Description: This page displays featured articles with a rotator on top and the remaining stories displayed as a list. Each list card carries the image, title, author name, created date, and estimated time to read the article.

Page.Name: Article Tile Page
Page.Description: This page displays featured articles with a rotator on top and the remaining stories displayed as tiles. Each tile card contains the image, title, author name, created date, and estimated time to read the article.

Category.Name: Detail
Category.Description: Display detailed and relevant information with random layouts.

Page.Name: Product Detail Page
Page.Description: This page showcases the complete details of a product with a rotator control to provide different images of the product, available size variants, product description, price, discount, and reviews.

Page.Name: Feedback Detail Page
Page.Description: This page displays the full-page product image and user feedback consisting of a short description and rating.

Page.Name: Article Detail Page
Page.Description: This page displays an article with a title, image, and text.

Category.Name: Chat
Category.Description: Exchange messages with users or customers inside your app and manage multiple conversations at once.

Page.Name: Recent Chat Page
Page.Description: This page displays a recent conversation in a chat application. The neatly designed page allows you to access the chat information of a user by tapping the user history.

Page.Name: Chat Conversation Page
Page.Description: This page displays a recent conversation with a contact in a chat application. The page provides options to send files, images, or any other attachments as well as text messages.

Category.Name: Reviews and Ratings
Category.Description: Let your users provide ratings and text feedback.

Page.Name: Feedback Page
Page.Description: This page lists the feedback received about a product. The page displays a feedback message with an author name, date, description, and rating.

Page.Name: Review Page
Page.Description: This page is a feedback form that receives feedback from a user. The page displays a product image and allows the user to update their rating, images, and description about their experience with the product.

Category.Name: Contact Us
Category.Description: Capture user contact information so you can get in touch with them later.

Page.Name: Contact Us Page
Page.Description: This page displays the location of an organization address in a map and displays the address over it. The page also provides options to review a message from user.

Category.Name: About Us
Category.Description: Create a simple About Us page that tells users who you are.

Page.Name: Simple About Us Page
Page.Description: This page displays organization information in a simple way. The organization logo is displayed at the top of the page followed by a short description.

Page.Name: About Us Page with Cards
Page.Description: This page displays organization information with different cards. Shadow effects on the cards provide an extraordinary look and feel.

Page.Name: About Us Page with Parallax Scrolling
Page.Description: This page displays organization information with parallax scrolling effects.

Category.Name: Navigation
Category.Description: Enable your users to navigate between pages or items at a high level.

Page.Name: Bottom Navigation Page
Page.Description: This page displays a navigation interface with icons and labels at the bottom of a page.

Page.Name: Navigation List Card Page
Page.Description: This page displays an item as a card in a list. Each card carries an image of the item, its description, and an overall rating.

Page.Name: Navigation Tile Card Page
Page.Description: This page displays an item as a card in a tile layout. Each tile contains an image of the item, its description, and an overall rating.

Category.Name: Onboarding
Category.Description: Get your users started with a new app or experience with step-by--step instructions.

Page.Name: Walkthrough Page
Page.Description: Guide users through a setup process on color gradient pages

Category.Name: Error and Empty
Category.Description: Alert users to errors, empty shopping carts, task lists, item selections, and more.

Page.Name: Empty Cart Page
Page.Description: This page represents a cart that doesn’t have any items with an illustrated empty cart image.

Page.Name: Location Denied Page
Page.Description: This page represents a location that cannot be accessed with an illustrated location image.

Page.Name: No Credits Page
Page.Description: This page represents a user without any credits with an illustrated credit image.

Page.Name: No Internet Connection Page
Page.Description: This page represents an unavailable internet connection with an illustrated internet connectivity image.

Page.Name: No Item Page
Page.Description: This page displays an illustrated empty box image that represents that no items are selected.

Page.Name: No Photos Page
Page.Description: This page is presented to users who have not selected any photos.

Page.Name: No Tasks Page
Page.Description: This page represents that a task is not assigned to the user with an illustration.

Page.Name: Not Enough Credits Page
Page.Description: This page provides information to a user who doesn’t have enough credits to access benefits.

Page.Name: No Videos Page
Page.Description: This page displays an illustrated video image that represents that no videos are selected.

Page.Name: Payment Failed Page
Page.Description: This page provides an alert to a user that their payment has failed.

Page.Name: Something Went Wrong Page
Page.Description: This page is used to show when an error occurs, but the actual error is undetermined.

Category.Name: Transaction
Category.Description: Pages for communicating the status of a purchase through an online shop to the user. This category includes pages for successful payments and payment failures.

Page.Name: Checkout Page
Page.Description: This page provides options to choose between different addresses to deliver a product to and receives payment information from the user.

Page.Name: Payment Success Page
Page.Description: This page notifies the user that their payment was successful.

Page.Name: Payment Failure Page
Page.Description: This page notifies the user that their payment was not successful.

Page.Name: Delivery Page
Page.Description: View delivery information like address and price details

Page.Name: Payment Page
Page.Description: View card and payment details

Category.Name: Bookmark
Category.Description: Interfaces for users to save shopping items, articles, or pages they’d like to return to later. Users can add or remove items they’ve saved as needed.

Page.Name: Wishlist Page
Page.Description: This page displays a list of items that an online shopper has saved to potentially purchase later.

Page.Name: Cart Page
Page.Description: This page displays a list of products as items added to a cart in a shopping application. The page also allows you to remove items from the shopping cart.

Page.Name: Article Bookmarks Page
Page.Description: This page displays bookmarked articles in a list. Each list card carries the image, title, author name, created date, and estimated time to read the article.

Category.Name: History
Category.Description: Interfaces that provide a list of recent actions performed by the user. They can be used to show recent transactions in financial apps, or recent purchases in shopping apps.

Page.Name: Transaction History Page
Page.Description: This page displays a list of recent transactions.

Page.Name: My Orders Page
Page.Description: This page displays a list of the user’s recent orders.

Category.Name: Social
Category.Description: Layouts for social media profile pages with different features, such as follower counts, profile pictures, biographical information, and related profiles.

Page.Name: Social Profile with Connections Page
Page.Description: This page displays a social media profile page with links to other profiles the user may be interested in.

Page.Name: Social Profile with Card Page
Page.Description: This page displays a social media profile with a user’s image, location, and biographical information presented on a card.

Category.Name: Profile
Category.Description: Display various user profiles related to an article, chat user, and more.

Page.Name: Author Profile Page
Page.Description: This page displays the author’s profile image and name, which can be edited by the author. A night mode switch is present to provide an effective reading display in dark settings.

Page.Name: Contacts Page
Page.Description: This page displays a contact’s profile in a chat application. It displays the contact’s profile picture, mail ID, contact number, and recent media files that have been shared with that contact.

Page.Name: Chat Profile Page
Page.Description: This page displays the user’s profile in a chat application. It displays their profile picture, mail ID, contact number, notifications, and help options.

Page.Name: Master Page
Page.Description: This page displays an interactive burger menu of article pages. If you are working with a master-details page for articles, this page will be the master page for navigating across the application.
